Uses of Class
info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.rewards.PermanentReward

  • Packages that use PermanentReward 
    Package Description
    info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities  
    info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.rewards  

    • Uses of PermanentReward in info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities

      Methods in info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities that return types with arguments of type PermanentReward 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<PermanentReward> PlayerGroup.getRewards()
      Gets all permanent rewards a group of player has already obtained.
      List<PermanentReward> Player.getRewards()
      Gets all permanent rewards a player has already obtained.
      Methods in info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities with parameters of type PermanentReward 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void PlayerGroup.addPermanentReward(PermanentReward reward)
      Adds a permanent reward like a Badge or Achievement to the list of all already obtained rewards.
      void Player.addPermanentReward(PermanentReward reward)
      Adds the transfered permanent reward like a Badge or Achievement to all already obtained rewards.
      Method parameters in info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities with type arguments of type PermanentReward 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void PlayerGroup.setRewards(List<PermanentReward> rewards)
      Sets the list of all permanent rewards a group of players has obtained.
      void Player.setRewards(List<PermanentReward> rewards)
      Sets the list of all permanent rewards a player has obtained.

    • Uses of PermanentReward in info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.rewards

      Subclasses of PermanentReward in info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.rewards 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Achievement
      The achievement class contains an image and a description for a documentary use to track significant results or milestones the player was able to achieve during her/his play.
      class  Badge
      The badge class serves as a Reward-subclass that represents a distinct icon.
